original_title: Bruno B.: The World's Luckiest Guy 3
overview: 'The World's Luckiest Guy' is back with some more awesome adventures. This volume has got 9 new girls and you are going to get to see Bruno fuck them all for the very first time.
tagline: Bruno Fucked Them All Before They Became Stars
title: Bruno B.: The World's Luckiest Guy 3
